Name: Silver Linings Playbook
Description: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

Director.Name: David O. Russell
Director.Bio: David Owen Russell is an American film writer, director, and producer.

Name: About Time
Description: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make the world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

Director.Name: Richard Curtis
Director.Bio: Richard Whalley Anthony Curtis is a British screenwriter, producer, and film director, primarily known for the romantic comedy films Four Weddings and a Funeral, Notting Hill, and Love Actually.

Name: Me Before You
Description: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently-paralyzed man she's taking care of.

Director.Name: Thea Sharrock
Director.Bio: Thea Sharrock is an English film and theatre director and writer, known for Me Before You, The Hollow Crown, and The One and Only Ivan.

Name: Someone Great
Description: After a devastating break up on the eve of her cross-country move, Jenny enjoys one last NYC adventure with her two best pals.

Director.Name: Jennifer Kaytin Robinson
Director.Bio: Jennifer Kaytin Robinson is an American actress, director, producer, and writer.

Name: Edge of Seventeen
Description: High-school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

Director.Name: Kelly Fremon Craig
Director.Bio: Kelly Fremon Craig is an American screenwriter, producer, and film director.

Name: Joy
Description: Joy is the story of the title character, who rose to become founder and matriarch of a powerful family business dynasty.

Director.Name: David O. Russell
Director.Bio: David Owen Russell is an American film writer, director, and producer.

Name: American Hustle
Description: A con man, Irving Rosenfeld, along with his seductive partner Sydney Prosser, is forced o work for a wild F.B.I. Agent, Richie DiMaso, who pushes them into a world of Jersey powerbrokers and the mafia.

Director.Name: David O. Russell
Director.Bio: David Owen Russell is an American film writer, director, and producer.

Name: Crazy Rich Asians
Description: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also suprpised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse - Nick's disapproving mother.

Director.Name: Jon M. Chu
Director.Bio: Jonathan Murray Chu is an American director and screenwriter. He is best known for directing Crazy Rich Asians, the first film by a major Hollywood studio to feature a majority cast of Asian descent in a modern setting since The Joy Luck Club in 1993.

Name: Holidate
Description: Fed up with being single on holidays, two strangers agree to be each other's platonic plus-ones all year long.

Director.Name: John Whitesell
Director.Bio: John Whitesell is an American television and film director.

Name: Last Christmas
Description: Nothing seems to go right for young Kate, a frustrated Londoner who works as an elf in a year-roundChristmas shop. But things soon take a turn for the better when she meets Tom -- a handsome charmer who seems too good to be true. As the city transforms into the most wonderful time of the year, Tom and Kate's growing attraction turns into the best gift of all -- a Yuletide romance.

Director.Name: Paul Feig
Director.Bio: Paul Samuel Feig is an American actor and filmmaker, known for directing Bridemaids, The Heat, and A Simple Favor.

Name: Love Hard
Description: After meeting her perfect match on a daitng app, an L.A. wrtier learns she has been catfished when she flies 3000 miles to surprise him for Christmas.

Director.Name: Hernan Jimenez
Director.Bio: Hernan Jimenez is a Costa Rican film director, screenwriter, actor, and stand-up comedian.
